attributes.action: Require councils to support residents to organise neighbours' street parties by not charging for road closures or requiring insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Street parties are a very powerful way for neighbours to meet, often for the first time, and in traffic-free streets. But many councils charge for road closures and require public liability insurance which stops them happening. But many councils do not and the bad practice ones need to be stopped from doing this.
